name: Patent Pending
description: Low-lit bar behind a hidden door in Patent Coffee, serving cocktails with an electric theme.

name: Fresh Kills
description: Attractive space for carefully-prepared craft cocktails.

name: Barely Disfigured
description: Low-lit lounge featuring craft cocktails amid bordello-inspired decor in a one-time massage parlor.

name: Mace
description: Creative craft cocktails & snacks in a petite brick-walled space with some banquette seats & stools.

name: Raine's Law Room
description: A semi-secret entrance (ring bell) leads to this plush lounge crafting Prohibition-era cocktails.

name: The Up & Up
description: Dimly lit cocktail lounge offering sophisticated drinks plus snacks in a space with banquettes.

name: Yours Sincerely
description: Handsome hangout with a marble bar for on-tap cocktails, beers & wines.

name: Pouring Ribbons
description: Contemporary craft cocktail bar with upscale lounge vibe & small menu of sophisticated bites
address: 225 Avenue B 2nd floor, New York, NY 10009

name: The Little Shop
description: Intimate, narrow eatery serving breakfast by day, plus spirits & innovative cocktails by night.

name: Pokito
description: Creative Latin-Asian cocktails offered in snug surrounds with whitewashed brick walls.

name: Undercote
description: Subterranean spot beneath a fine-dining restaurant with craft cocktails, champagne & jungle decor.

name: Gallow Green
description: Open year-round, this roof lounge with a green-garden vibe serves chic cocktails & punch bowls.

name: Sunshine Laundromat
description: Brooklyn's finest laundromat, craft beer, and pinball emporium.

name: Terra Blues
description: Both local & nationally known blues acts perform at this laid-back second-floor music club.
